bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with yu 鬱①, pent-up [qi]. Yi xue ru men 醫學入門 4: 凡房勞思恐傷腎，陰虛 口中有味，夜熱晝輕者，俱宜四物湯加知、柏、黃芩；甚者，加童便、 龜板峻補其陰。有鬱抑者，下甲丸 , “Whenever after over-indulgence in sex one fears that the kidneys are harmed, with yin depletion and a flavor in the mouth, and with nocturnal heat that is milder during daytime, it is advisable [to use] the decoction with the four items, amended by zhi [ mu ], bai , and huang qin . In severe cases boys’ urine and tortoise shell are to be added to quickly supplement the [patient’s] yin. In the case of pent-up [qi] restraint , ingest pills with [tortoise] shell”.
